# Setup

```{r packages}
sapply(list("sf", "tidyverse", "raster", "ows4R", "here"), 
       library, character.only = TRUE, logical.return = TRUE)

source(here("R", "download_fisbroker_metadata.R"))
```


# Data

```{r data}
gc <- st_read(here("data-raw", "berlin", "green_capacity_berlin_2010_3035",
                   "green_capacity_berlin_2010_3035.gpkg"))

berlin_district <- st_read(here("data-raw", "berlin", "berlin_districts_2020_3035", "berlin_districts_2020_3035.gpkg"))

temp_ras <- raster(here("data-proc", "berlin", "template_raster_berlin_10m_2020_3035", "template_raster_berlin_10m_2020_3035.tif"))

library(tmap)
tm_shape(gc) + tm_polygons("VEGVOL")

gc_ras <- raster::rasterize(x = gc %>% as("Spatial"),
                            y = temp_ras,
                                   field = "VEGVOL",
                            fun = "modal")

plot(gc_ras)

gc_ras[is.na(gc_ras)] <- 0

gc_ras_mask <- raster::mask(x = gc_ras, 
                                 mask = berlin_district,
                                 updatevalue = NA
                                 )
plot(gc_ras_mask)

create_meta_raster(gc_ras_mask, 
                   name = "green_capacity_berlin_raster_10m",
                   date = "2010",
                   epsg = "3035",
                   units = "[m³/m²]",
                   descr = NA,
                   orig_source = read.csv(here("data-raw", "berlin", "green_capacity_berlin_2010_3035", "metadata_green_capacity_berlin_2010_3035.csv"), header = TRUE)$source,
                   data_source = here("data-raw", "berlin", "green_capacity_berlin_2010_3035",
                   "green_capacity_berlin_2010_3035.gpkg"),
                   d_down = NA,
                   mod = "NAs (zero values) inside Berlin borders where set to 0",
                   path = "data-proc/berlin",
                   folder = TRUE)

writeRaster(gc_ras_mask, here("data-proc", "berlin", "green_capacity_berlin_raster_10m_2010_3035", "green_capacity_berlin_raster_10m_2010_3035.tif"), overwrite = TRUE)
```
